Question: There are exactly three knee pads.

Reference Answer: True

Left image URL: https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/61nQV2wHLUL._SY355_.jpg

Right image URL: https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/615-tgSOwVL._SL1001_.jpg

Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=LEFT,question='How many knee pads are in the image?')
ANSWER1=VQA(image=RIGHT,question='How many knee pads are in the image?')
ANSWER2=EVAL(expr='{ANSWER0} + {ANSWER1} == 3')
FINAL_ANSWER=RESULT(var=ANSWER2)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='How many knee pads are in the image?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>2</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER1</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='How many knee pads are in the image?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>1</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER2</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>EVAL</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>expression</span></b>="ANSWER0 + ANSWER1 == 3")=<b><span style='color: red;'>EVAL</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>expression</span></b>="2 + 1 == 3")=<b><span style='color: green;'>True</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER2</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>True</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: True
